title: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled 'Error'.
OB: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The user is unsure of how to save or discard the changes. The error message is not informative and simply states 'Source page is dirty'.
EB: The software should provide clearer instructions on how to save or discard changes when switching back to the Layout view. The error message should be more descriptive and provide guidance on how to proceed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the XML Report Designer. 
2. Switch to the 'source' view of the Layout Editor. 
3. Make changes to the XML. 
4. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view. 
5. Observe the error message and confusion on how to save or discard the changes.
